=== Ubuntu and GIS ===

Ubuntu supports a number of GIS and geospatial related packages, including QGIS, GRASS and mapserver. Installation is as simple as:

<pre>
sudo apt-get install cgi-mapserver grass qgis
</pre>

Specific notes are also available for people interested in developing / BuildingQuantumGisFromSource.
